patthana2.11:1.1_0: Upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—diṭṭhupādānaṁ paṭicca kāmupādānaṁ,
patthana2.11:2.1_0: Upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—upādāne paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.11:3.1_0: Upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—diṭṭhupādānaṁ paṭicca
patthana2.11:3.1_1: kāmupādānaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.11:4.1_0: Noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—noupādānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.11:4.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.11:4.1_7: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.11:5.1_0: Noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—noupādāne khandhe paṭicca upādānā.
patthana2.11:6.1_0: Noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—noupādānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.11:6.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā upādānā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.11:6.1_2: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā upādānā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.11:7.1_0: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— diṭṭhupādānañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca kāmupādānaṁ.
patthana2.11:8.1_0: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—noupādānaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca
patthana2.11:8.1_1: upādānañca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.11:8.1_3: upādānañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.11:9.1_0: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṁ paṭicca upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—noupādānaṁ
patthana2.11:9.1_1: ekaṁ khandhañca diṭṭhupādānañca paṭicca tayo khandhā kāmupādānañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana2.11:10.1_0: Upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana2.11:11.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana2.11:12.1_7: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ; bāhiraṁ …
patthana2.11:12.1_11: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.11:13.1_0: Upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—upādāne paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.11:14.1_0: Noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— noupādāne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.11:15.1_0: Upādānañca noupādānaṁ ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—upādāne ca sampayuttake
patthana2.11:15.1_2: upādāne ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.11:17.1_0: Upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe attavādupādānaṁ paṭicca kāmupādānaṁ,
patthana2.11:18.1_0: Upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe upādāne paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā,
patthana2.11:21.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ (sabbattha ekaṁ), magge ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.

patthana2.11:24.1_4: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā noupādānā khandhā.

patthana2.11:26.1_1: paccayā tayo khandhā upādānā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.11:28.1_1: upādānañca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.11:29.1_0: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṁ paccayā upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—noupādānaṁ

patthana2.11:29.1_2: Diṭṭhupādānañca vatthuñca paccayā kāmupādānaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā …pe…. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.11:31.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana2.11:33.1_5: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.11:36.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.

patthana2.11:40.1_0: Noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ noupādānaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.11:40.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.11:46.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Noupādānā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ upādānānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.11:57.1_0: Upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā upādānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi …

patthana2.11:58.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā upādānā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ upādānānaṁ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.11:61.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ upādānānaṁ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.11:62.1_1: ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ upādānānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.11:62.1_3: upādānā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.11:64.1_0: Upādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,

patthana2.11:70.1_0: Noupādāno dhammo upādānassa ca noupādānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,

patthana2.11:73.1_0: Upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā noupādānassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.11:76.1_1: khandhānaṁ upādānānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.11:80.1_3: **Pacchājātaṁ**—pacchājātā upādānā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.11:84.1_0: Upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā noupādānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
